original_text: Like as a woman with child, that draweth near the time of her delivery, is in pain, and crieth out in her pangs; so have we been in thy sight, O Lord.
korean_text: 여호와여 잉태한 여인이 산기가 임박하여 산고를 겪으며 부르짖음 같이 우리가 주 앞에서 그와 같으니이다

sentences.original_text: Like as a woman with child
that draweth near the time of her delivery
and crieth out in her pangs
so have we been in thy sight, O Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 오 주여, 우리도 주 앞에서 그러하였나이다
